messages.subject: I am going to ask....
messages.msgSnippet: ... that we talk about  topics or ideas and not each other.  Staying on the topic rather than an individual does keep from arguments over controversial topics
messages.messageBody:
... that we talk about topics or ideas and not each other. Staying on the
topic rather than an individual does keep from arguments over controversial
topics from becoming a personal flame war. Personal flame wars serve no
purpose what-so-ever and make it hard for important discussions to take
place.

I have seen debates on spanking and parenting styles change minds. I know
people who have been deeply affected by their online discussions, but never
when they spiral down into you did/no I didn't/yes you did exchanges. So,
please let's take a collective deep breath and return to discussing the
topics at hand.

Thanks,

LisaKK
